participant_2.background:
I play the cello to express myself and connect with my best friend who lives in the city.
my name is sarah.
i like painting , i can cook well.
my favorite artist was prince.
i have a cat named felix and a small terror names emmy.

content.text: Hey, Sarah! How was your day?
Hey! It was good, I got to spend some time with my best friend and play cello with her.
That sounds fun! I've always wanted to learn how to play the cello.
It's really fun, and you can express yourself so much more than with other instruments.
I can imagine. I've been trying to find a way to connect with my emotions more, and I think music might be a good way.
That's a great idea! Music is a powerful way to express yourself.
Do you have any advice for me on where to start learning how to play the cello?
I would recommend finding a good teacher, especially if you're a beginner. They can help you get started on the right foot and make sure you're playing correctly.
That's a good idea. I'll look into that. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
How long have you been playing the cello?
I've been playing for about 10 years now.
Wow! That's a long time.
It is. I started when I was 10 years old.
Do you have any other hobbies besides playing the cello?
Yes, I love to paint and cook. I'm also a big fan of Prince.
I love to paint too! I've never met anyone else who does.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new people to paint with.
Maybe we could paint together sometime.
That would be great
